features: Squared Grid: PaperMart's Dressmakers Squared Sewing Pattern Template Paper features a squared grid with 1cm and 2cm squares, allowing you to create accurate and detailed sewing patterns. The grid provides a reference point for measuring and designing with precision.

Versatile Use: Whether you're drafting your own dressmaking sewing patterns, making alterations to existing patterns, or creating custom designs, this template paper is versatile and adaptable to a wide range of sewing and crafting projects.

High-Quality Paper: Crafted from high-quality 50gsm paper, PaperMart's Dressmakers Squared Template Paper is sturdy and durable. It can withstand the rigors of pattern-making, ensuring that your designs remain intact throughout the process. At 50gsm thick, even tracing wouldn't be a difficult task!

Clear and Easy to Use: The square grid is clear and easy to read. The dotted grid lines are 1cm apart and solid grid lines are 2cm apart, making it effortless to plot and draft your sewing patterns. It provides a visual guide for precise measurements and design placement.

Convenient Size & Form: This grid pattern paper is available in 36"/91cm width by 10m in length. This fits majority of pattern-making and drafting needs. It's easy to store and transport, making it a practical addition to your sewing toolkit. The paper is supplied as a roll and is wound on to a cardboard core allowing for greater rigidity during handling/use. It is packed in a strong cardboard tube suitable for postage as well as storage!

Beginner-Friendly: Whether you're a seasoned dressmaker maker or a beginner exploring the world of sewing, this template paper is beginner-friendly and suitable for all skill levels. It simplifies the pattern-making process.

Cost-Effective: Save time and resources by PaperMart's square grided paper to draft and experiment with your sewing patterns. It allows you to create multiple iterations without the need for expensive pattern paper. At 10m long, its a pefect length for small projects!

Endless Creativity: With PaperMart's Dressmakers Squared Sewing Pattern Paper, you can bring your creative sewing ideas to life. Explore different styles, designs, and alterations with confidence and precision.
description: PaperMart's Dressmakers Squared Sewing Pattern Paper is designed for precision and ease in pattern drafting. Featuring a clear grid with 1cm dotted and 2cm solid lines, it serves as a reliable guide for accurate measurements and design adjustments. Whether you are drafting new patterns, modifying existing ones, or creating custom sewing and crafting designs, this paper provides the structure needed for professional-quality results. Crafted from high-quality 50gsm paper, it is durable, easy to trace on, and ensures that patterns remain intact during repeated use. Measuring 36” (91cm) wide by 10m long, it offers ample space for pattern-making while remaining easy to store and transport. Supplied on a cardboard core, it provides extra rigidity during handling and is packed in a strong cardboard tube for secure postage and storage, protecting the paper from damage. Suitable for all skill levels, from beginners to professionals, this squared pattern paper simplifies the pattern-making process. Its cost-effective 10m length makes it ideal for small projects and multiple pattern iterations without the high cost of premium paper. Whether you're designing garments, making alterations, or experimenting with new styles, PaperMart’s squared grid paper provides a versatile and reliable foundation for creative sewing projects.
